japanese:
はぁ……。
今日は大変でしたね……。
translation:
*sigh*
It was a tough day today...

japanese: 本当に疲れたわ……。
translation: I'm really exhausted...

japanese:
みんな、ゴメン。
私がもうちょっと気をつけてれば、
あんなに騒がれることもなかったのに。
translation:
Sorry, everyone. If I had been a little more careful,
we wouldn't have caused such a commotion.

japanese: ううん、一花のせいじゃないよ。
translation: No, it's not your fault, Ichika.

japanese:
みんなで同じ格好してたんだし、
あれだけ注目を集めちゃったら
バレるのだって時間の問題だったと思う。
translation:
Since we were all dressed the same way, I think
it was only a matter of time before we got caught,
attracting that much attention.

japanese:
でも、あそこまで騒ぎになるとはね。
公園のあとは、ほとんど観光できなかったし。
translation:
But I didn't expect it to cause such a commotion.
After the park, we couldn't really do any sightseeing.

japanese: ええ、終始逃げ回っていた気がします。
translation:
Yeah, I felt like we were
just running around the whole time.

japanese:
相当、走り回ったよね。
上杉さんや三玖はキツかったんじゃないかな。
translation:
Miku, I bet you and Uesugi-san had it 
really tough with all that running around.

japanese: もう限界……。
translation: I'm at my limit...

japanese:
はっ！？
三玖の魂が抜け出てる！
translation:
WHA?!
Your soul is leaving your body!

japanese: 三玖、しっかりしてください！
translation: Miku, stay strong!

japanese:
だ、大丈夫。
なんとか生きてるから。
translation:
I-it's okay.
Somehow, I'm still alive.

japanese:
でも、こういうのは久しぶり。
なんだか小さな頃みたいだった。
translation:
But, it's been a while since I felt like this.
It's like being a kid again.

japanese:
確かに、懐かしくもあったわね。
あの頃はいつもお揃いの格好してたから、
初めて会う人には驚かれてたし。
translation:
Yeah, it was kind of nostalgic.
We always wore matching outfits back then,
so people we met for the first time were surprised.

japanese: 知らない人から見たら、五つ子自体が珍しいしね。
translation:
For strangers, quintuplets themselves 
are already quite rare.

japanese:
でも、さ。
このままだと上杉さんも困るんじゃないかな？
translation:
That may be so.
If we keep going on like this,
won't Uesugi-san also be in trouble?

japanese:
ええ……。
行く先々で騒がれていては、
五つ子ゲームどころではありません。
translation:
Yeah... If we keep attracting attention
everywhere we go, it won't be a quintuplets game anymore.

japanese:
期限は明日の夕方ですが、
このままでは厳しいでしょうね。
translation:
The deadline is tomorrow evening,
but it'll be tough to finish like this.

japanese: だからって、期限を延ばすなんてなしよ。
translation: But that doesn't mean we should extend the deadline.

japanese:
フー君が答えを出さずに旅行を終えたりしたら、
また、いままでのような関係が
ズルズル続くかもしれない。
translation:
If Fu-kun doesn't give an answer and finishes the trip,
our relationship might continue to deteriorate.

japanese: それだけは絶対に嫌。
translation: That's the one thing I absolutely don't want.

japanese: うん。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
彼も、私たちを見分けようと
必死になっているようですし――
translation:
He also seems like he's desperately
trying to tell us apart%p-2;――

japanese:
気持ちの整理も、
しっかりとできているといいのですが。
translation: I hope he can sort out his feelings properly, though.

japanese: あのぉ……。
translation: Umm...

japanese: 四葉？
translation: Yotsuba?

japanese:
えーとね？
いまやってる五つ子ゲームって、
上杉さんの気持ちを確かめるためだよね？
translation:
So, like?
The quintuplet game we're playing now
is to confirm Uesugi-san's feelings, right?

japanese: もちろん、そうだけど。
translation: Of course.

japanese:
変装してる私たちから、
フー君が心に決めた人を見分けて告白する。
そういうことだもの。
translation:
We dress up in disguise, and Fu-kun
has to identify the person he's chosen
in his heart and confess to them.

japanese:
だよね！
でも、いまの上杉さんって――
translation:
That's right!
But, the way Uesugi-san is right now%p-2;――

japanese:
『どの五月が誰なのか』って、
それを見破ることを考えちゃってる気がするんだ。
translation:
I feel like he's just trying to figure out
'which Itsuki is which.'

japanese: ……えっ？

うん、私も四葉と同じ。
そんな感じがしてる。
translation:
Yeah, I'm with Yotsuba here.
I feel the same way.

japanese:
もしかして、やりすぎちゃったのかも。
今回は変装するだけじゃなくて、
フータロー君を惑わすようなことも色々としたし。
translation:
We might have gone too far this time.
We not only disguised ourselves,
but also did various things to confuse Futaro-kun.

japanese:
あ～……。
私もバレそうになった時に、
あんたたちの真似して誤魔化したりしたわね。
translation:
Ah...
I also pretended to be one of you
when he was catching on.

japanese:
それで、私たちの変装を見破ることに
あんなに躍起になってたのかな？
translation:
So, I wonder if that's why he was so
determined to see through our disguises?

japanese:
確かに……。
ここまで積み重ねたものを否定されたくない、と、
そう躍起になって……。
translation:
Indeed...
He didn't want to deny everything he had built
up to this point, so he became really desperate...

japanese:
うーん、フータロー君の中で
目的と手段がごちゃごちゃになってるわけか。
translation:
Hmm, it seems like the purpose and the means
are all jumbled up in Futaro-kun's mind.

japanese:
ですが、期限は明日です。
このままでは……。
translation:
Yet, the deadline is tomorrow.
If we don't do something soon...

japanese: ううん、大丈夫だよ。
translation: No, it's okay.

japanese: 三玖？
translation: Miku?

japanese:
フータローは、恋愛が苦手だから
こういう時にすぐ間違えちゃうけど、
それでも、一生懸命に考えてくれてる。
translation:
Futaro isn't good at romance,
so he tends to make mistakes in situations like this,
but he's still trying his best.

japanese:
半年経ったとはいえ、
今度こそ答えを出すって決めてくれたのも――
translation:
Even though half a year has passed,
he still decided to give us an answer this time%p-2;――

japanese:
フータローが、私たちと
ちゃんと向き合ってくれてるからなんだ。
translation: It's because Futaro is facing us properly.

japanese: だから私は、フータローを信じてる。
translation: That's why I believe in him.

japanese:
……そうですね。
きっと彼なりに真剣なのでしょう。
translation:
...Well, I suppose so.
He's probably serious in his own way.

japanese:
それに、１年前の温泉旅行の時、
フータローは私を見分けることができたし。
translation:
And, during the hot springs trip a year ago,
Futaro was able to tell it was me.

japanese:
あ……。
おじいちゃんのところで五月の格好をしてた時？
translation:
Ah...
When we were dressed like Itsuki at Grandpa's house?

japanese:
ああ……。
そうだったんだ。
translation:
Yeah...
That's right.

japanese:
その事実を越えてもらわないと……
誰が選ばれるとしても、認めてあげられない。
translation:
He's got to have improved more from that time...
No matter who he chooses, we have to accept it.

japanese: フータローには、ちゃんと全部知ってて欲しいから。
translation: I want Futaro to know everything.

japanese: 同感ね。
translation: I agree.

japanese:
私たちが同じ外見、同じ性格だったのは
もう遠い昔のことだわ。
translation:
The time when we had the same appearance
and personality is a thing of the past now.

japanese:
いまじゃ、好きも嫌いもバラバラ。
みんな変わってしまった。
translation:
Now, we all have different likes and dislikes.
Everyone has changed.

japanese:
フー君が家庭教師として
私たちの生活の中に入ってきてからは、
もっと変わったわよね？
translation:
Since Fu-kun came into our lives as a tutor,
things have changed even more, right?

japanese: そう言ってる二乃が一番変わったんじゃない？
translation:
Nino, you say that,
but I think you're the one who has changed the most.

japanese: あんただってかなり変わったわよ？
translation: Well, you've changed a lot too, haven't you?

japanese:
まあ、この１年半の間に
それだけのことがあったってことよね。
translation:
Well, I guess there have been a lot of things
that have happened in the past year and a half.

japanese:
そういうすべてを……
フー君には、ちゃんとわかっていてもらいたいのよ。
translation:
I want Fu-kun...
to understand all of that.

japanese: あんたたちだって、そうなんじゃないの？
translation: You guys feel the same way, right?

japanese:
……うん。
見た目や言葉遣いなんて、いくらでも変えられる。
translation:
...Yeah.
We can change our appearance
and way of speaking as much as we want.

japanese: でも、心の中の一番大切な部分だけは変えられない。
translation:
But we can't change
the most important part in our hearts.

japanese: そこに気づいてくれたなら、やっぱり嬉しいかな。
translation: If he can realize that, then I'd be happy.

japanese: そうじゃなきゃ納得いかないわ。
translation: If not, I won't be satisfied.

japanese:
フータロー君は、
恋愛オンチで優柔不断な朴念仁だけど。
translation:
Futaro-kun may be inept at romance and indecisive,
but he tries his best.

japanese:
なんだかんだで頑張り屋さんだから……
できない、とか、無理だ、なんて言ったら失礼だ。
translation:
He's a hard worker, so it's impolite to say
that he can't do it or that it's impossible.

japanese: あとは上杉さんを信じるしかないよ。
translation: We just have to trust Uesugi-san.

japanese: ええ、彼を信じましょう。
translation: Yes, let's trust him.

japanese: ……いよいよ、明日なんだ。
translation: ...It's finally tomorrow.

japanese: 明日……。
translation: Tomorrow...

japanese:
さてと！
私たちも明日に備えて休もっか。
translation:
Well then! Let's take a break,
and prepare for tomorrow.

japanese:
そうね。
三玖、部屋に戻りましょ。
translation:
Agreed. Miku,
let's head back to our room.

japanese:
うん。
四葉、おやすみ。
translation: Okay. Yotsuba, good night.

japanese: うん、おやすみー！
translation: Good niiight!

japanese: 五月ちゃん、行こうか。
translation: Itsuki-chan, shall we go?

japanese:
すみません。
少し四葉と２人で話したいことがあるので。
translation:
Excuse me.
There's something I want to talk to Yotsuba about
in private.

japanese: 四葉と？
translation: With Yotsuba?

japanese:
……わかった。
じゃあ、先に行くね。
translation:
...Alright.
Then, I'll head out first.

japanese: 五月の答えは出た？
translation: Have you made your decision, Itsuki?

japanese: ……私も、あれから必死に考えました。
translation: ...I've been thinking hard since then, too.

japanese:
『恋』という問題は、とても難しいのですね。
上杉君が悩み苦労するのも、いまならよくわかります。
translation:
'Love' is a very complicated issue, isn't it?
I can now understand why Uesugi-kun
has been struggling with it.

japanese:
そして、四葉やみんなが、
この感情にどれだけ身を焦がす思いをしてきたのかも。
translation:
And, how much you all
have been burning with these feelings.

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese:
これから先、どのような変化が訪れるとしても、
それを受け入れるだけの覚悟はできたつもりです。
translation:
I will be ready to accept
whatever may come, from here on out.

japanese:
だからこそ、明日、
どんな終わりを迎えようとも後悔はしません。
translation:
That's why I won't regret tomorrow,
no matter how it ends.

japanese:
そっか。
間に合って良かった。
translation:
I see.
I'm glad we made it in time.

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Yes.
